commit.message:
exr_file: Refactor exr_write into single function (#128)

Previsously there were two sperate functions for writing 16 bit and 32
bit EXR files which led to work duplication and errors. We now have a
single function that reduces code duplication and will hopefully mean
any updates to the functionality are easier to implement.

Fixes #124

verification.payload:
tree a702c14703369f3d9acedd1f426d9f4905d4b7b1
parent 900835367370e5686c3c0267da6710ea169a13d7
author ThomasWilshaw <thomaswilshaw@gmail.com> 1676616986 +0000
committer GitHub <noreply@github.com> 1676616986 -0800

exr_file: Refactor exr_write into single function (#128)

Previsously there were two sperate functions for writing 16 bit and 32
bit EXR files which led to work duplication and errors. We now have a
single function that reduces code duplication and will hopefully mean
any updates to the functionality are easier to implement.

Fixes #124

commit.message:
dpx_file: Throw exception on invalid file read (#125)

If dpx_read() fails to open a file for any reason, report the failure
via a exception and return 0.

Fixes #122

verification.payload:
tree 6aa8100c4ac88a7ac8e7200a7c3c81c15c0edb20
parent 14eb3460ee1fe947e615086a6f3f359141953b98
author ThomasWilshaw <thomaswilshaw@gmail.com> 1674885583 +0000
committer GitHub <noreply@github.com> 1674885583 -0800

dpx_file: Throw exception on invalid file read (#125)

If dpx_read() fails to open a file for any reason, report the failure
via a exception and return 0.

Fixes #122

commit.message:
Start moving ctlrender tests to CTest (#114)

* Move ctlrender tests from test.sh to CMake CTest

* closes #113 

* Skip tiff conversions if no tiff support

* ctlrender tests: add tiff32 conversions

* ctlrender tests: fix ctlrender path override

* Force Windows release to use x64 packages

* Enforce x64 on WIndows release test suite

* improve tiff error handling debugging info

* handle invalid filename in dpx_write()

* Move ctlrender test output to build folder

* removed fedora-35 docker having yum update issue

* ctlrender test: add exr<->exr tests

* ctlrender test: Use variable to simplify file paths

* ctlrender test: Add tiff <-> exr conversion tests

* ctlrender test: exr<->tif don't compare like to like

* ctlrender test: Add invalid input file tests

* ctlrender test: Add invalid output file tests

Co-authored-by: michaeldsmith <37905569+michaeldsmith@users.noreply.github.com>

commit.message:
Update build system (#115)

* fix some installation paths

Use GNUInstallDirs variable throughout the build system.

Bug: https://github.com/ampas/CTL/issues/100
Signed-off-by: Bernd Waibel <waebbl-gentoo@posteo.net>

* streamline finding OpenEXR and Imath / IlmBase

The search for OpenEXR and IlmBase resp. Imath dependencies can be
simplified, as OpenEXR depends on either Imath or IlmBase, depending
if we use <OpenEXR-3 or >=OpenEXR-3.

Signed-off-by: Bernd Waibel <waebbl-gentoo@posteo.net>

* enable testing only when CMAKE_BUILD_TESTS=ON

The function enable_testing was globally enabled, no matter the value
of the CMAKE_BUILD_TESTS option. This patch guards this call, so it
only gets called, when CMAKE_BUILD_TESTS=ON.

Signed-off-by: Bernd Waibel <waebbl-gentoo@posteo.net>

* require C++ 11 using set(CMAKE_CXX_STANDARD 11)

* add #include <limits> for std::numeric_limits

* remove pkg-config *.pc.in and cmake *.cmake.in files

Signed-off-by: Bernd Waibel <waebbl-gentoo@posteo.net>
Co-authored-by: michaeldsmith <37905569+michaeldsmith@users.noreply.github.com>

verification.payload:
tree e2230d97353a3dde46f1f06e91e6e17c4f0c352e
parent 24830470b4ca121679760442fb68c399f743ac46
author Bernd <waebbl-gentoo@posteo.net> 1673536372 +0100
committer GitHub <noreply@github.com> 1673536372 -0800

Update build system (#115)

* fix some installation paths

Use GNUInstallDirs variable throughout the build system.

Bug: https://github.com/ampas/CTL/issues/100
Signed-off-by: Bernd Waibel <waebbl-gentoo@posteo.net>

* streamline finding OpenEXR and Imath / IlmBase

The search for OpenEXR and IlmBase resp. Imath dependencies can be
simplified, as OpenEXR depends on either Imath or IlmBase, depending
if we use <OpenEXR-3 or >=OpenEXR-3.

Signed-off-by: Bernd Waibel <waebbl-gentoo@posteo.net>

* enable testing only when CMAKE_BUILD_TESTS=ON

The function enable_testing was globally enabled, no matter the value
of the CMAKE_BUILD_TESTS option. This patch guards this call, so it
only gets called, when CMAKE_BUILD_TESTS=ON.

Signed-off-by: Bernd Waibel <waebbl-gentoo@posteo.net>

* require C++ 11 using set(CMAKE_CXX_STANDARD 11)

* add #include <limits> for std::numeric_limits

* remove pkg-config *.pc.in and cmake *.cmake.in files

Signed-off-by: Bernd Waibel <waebbl-gentoo@posteo.net>
Co-authored-by: michaeldsmith <37905569+michaeldsmith@users.noreply.github.com>

  contain a function name that is either main or the same as the
  module name
